page.title: 06SERVICES.
page.content: There are five shops in our village. There are Eastern Counties Farmers, Mr.Showell's,Mr.Letch's and the Post Office.There is also Mr. Mann's, the butcher. Mr. Showell sells foodstuffs. Mr. Letch sells groceries.The Post Office sells sweets,cards and bread as well as stamps.Eastern Counties Farmers sell everything a farmer needs. There are two pubs in the village. The Little Rose is a Greene King pub, and the Jolly Brewers is a Charles Wells pub. (C.Robinson). The milkman,postlady,icecream van and coalman come every day.The laundry van and dustman come every Tuesday.The fish and fruit van comes every Wednesday.The library van and fish and chip van come every Friday. The window cleaner comes once a week. (D.Staples & M.Shipp).
